xyz.cathal.answerbox

Class BrowseAnswersFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • android.app.ListFragment
        • xyz.cathal.answerbox.BrowseAnswersFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, OnBackPressedListener, TaskListener

    public class BrowseAnswersFragment
extends android.app.ListFragment
implements OnBackPressedListener, TaskListener
    A fragment that displays a list of items by binding to an ArrayList of Answers.
    Author:
    Cathal Conroy
